publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2763.1 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Asylum Centre, RAF Turnhouse-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2763) in the name of Margaret Smith, leave out from first "considers" to end and insert "recommends to the Home Office that the RAF Turnhouse site adjacent to runways and Edinburgh International Airport is unsuitable for use as a major accommodation and reception centre for up to 750 asylum seekers on grounds of security, that the Executive and local authorities be consulted fully prior to the installation and opening of any reception centres in Scotland and that the Executive and local authorities should be fully recompensed for any additional costs, for example on social work and education, accruing as a result of the national dispersal programme."
S1M-2763.1 Asylum Centre, RAF Turnhouse (lodged on 1 March 2002) Phil Gallie*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2763.1 Asylum Centre, RAF Turnhouse (lodged on 1 March 2002) David McLetchie*
